settings.heading: Allergen Statement
settings.content:
____________________

While we strive to keep a sterile environment, we cannot guarantee that guests with allergies or serious food sensitivities (especially to nuts or seeds) may not be exposed to cross contamination. As such, please understand that Karma Baker cannot be responsible for any injury, loss or damage claimed by any guest with food allergies who consumes our food, regardless of circumstances.

settings.heading: Care Instructions
settings.content:
Your treats are shipped with Fedex 2-day service. They are sent frozen with ice packs to keep them looking good. They may arrive to you warm and that is OK!!! YOUR TREATS ARE STILL FINE TO EAT. They will be fine and very deliscious even after 3-5 days of transit.

Refridgerate upon delivery to keep them nice. We recommend eating them at room temperature or warmed up (especially our mega cookies! Warming directions are included.)

All items may be refridgerated for a week or frozen for longer life.

settings.heading: Shipping Details
settings.content: This item is sent with FedEx 2-Day service. Rates start $16.95

settings.title: Quick Shipping
settings.text:
All items except for cakes & pies ship by FedEx 2-day for $16.95 for the first item. $5 for each additional 5 lbs after that.

Cakes & pies ship Fed-Ex Overnight for free. And separately from other items.

Please choose your delivery day 1 day before you plan to eat!

settings.title: How to Store & Eat our treats
settings.text:
Most all of our treats are best eaten at room temperature. It makes them soft and gooey and delicious.

This goes for cupcakes jars, donuts, cookies, brownies and similar treats.

Store items in the fridge for about 5 days. Or you can freeze everything for longer life.
